page.title: 10RECREATION
page.content: Parish Council are custodians of {Recreation Field} & the Recreation Committee organise events and run the ' 200 ' Club to raise funds for repairs and supply of equipment. A Village Gala is held on the field every summer.{ Football Club} was re-formed in 1972 after gap of 19 years. There are 2 teams with playing staff of about 30 who play in the 2nd Div. of the North Lancshire & District League. There are many supporters from the village & environs. { Bowling Club has about 40 members and plays from April to October: Friendly matches v Hornby, Bentham & Ingleton. There is a Knock-out competition at the end of the season, winner awarded Cup.{Burton {Amblers} formed just over a year ago. Walk planned every 10 days ( weather permitting ) from April to October. Average on walk = 25. All ages.
